title: meal_administrations
description: Array containing all meal administrations for a given profile.

items.title: meal_administration
items.description: Meal administration protocol. One per type of meal administration.

time_value.description: Time point of the drug administration.

meal_composition.description: Composition of the meal in percentages. Broken down by liquid and solid fractions.
meal_composition.title: meal_composition

composition_liquid.description: Liquid composition of the meal in percentages.
composition_liquid.title: meal_composition_liquid

composition_solid.description: Solid composition of the meal in percentages.
composition_solid.title: meal_composition_solid

meal_description.description: Description of the meal, i.e. 'light meal'.
